left: customized to the students' level and pace of learning
answering any question even outside class hours, within 24 hours.
right: utilization of technologies desired by clients
quick adaptation to any type of project, team and development environment
familiar with React, Laravel, Flutter, Python, Docker, PostgreSQL, and many others.

AboutSection.title: About us
description: Here at Blue Kitsunebi, we blend our love for foreign languages with IT, offering services in both fields. In both cases, we emphasize providing quality services that meet our clients' expectations.

We offer online courses for Japanese language (taught in Romanian/English) and English language (taught in Japanese). We do everything possible to ensure a unique, distinct experience in exploring these languages, focusing on each student's individual objectives when designing the lessons. We believe that motivation is key when it comes to acquiring new skills such as mastering a foreign language.

Our software development services primarily focus on creating custom presentation websites (like this one) and mobile applications, but our experience doesn't limit us to just these two categories. We have experience with React, Laravel, Flutter, Python, Docker, PostgreSQL, and many others, but we are open to any kind of offers even if they are on other technologies than these.

LanguageCoursesSection.title: Japanese language online courses
description: Our Japanese language teacher has dedicated a significant portion of his time learning this language and has mastered it at an advanced level. The teaching method is as efficient as possible and is based on his experiences both as a student and as a teacher. Teaching is done at the pace of the student/group of students, with an emphasis on building solid foundations and a deep understanding of the language. Our company also offers English courses to native Japanese speakers and collaborates with Japanese in the IT field, so you can be sure that the level of Japanese of our teacher is more than sufficient to meet your requirements.

The Japanese language is not as difficult as it is believed to be, in fact, we believe it presents more logical elements than most other languages. Whether you're doing it out of passion, or you need it for a certain reason, we can provide exactly the knowledge you need to achieve your goal.
We are eager to meet new lovers of the Japanese language and anime fans to share our passion (≧▽≦).

teacher.name: Chesca Vicentiu
description: Experience as a tour guide and interpreter for Japanese tourist groups
Experience in online translation of documents and writings from Japanese to English and vice versa
Experience in collaborating with native Japanese on software development projects
Over 5 years of experience in teaching Japanese language

ProgrammingSection.title: Software Development
description: We use technologies such as React, Laravel, Flutter, Python, Docker, PostgreSQL etc. to develop software applications according to our customers' wishes. The main object of our activity is to create custom presentation websites and mobile applications. We can follow a design already prepared by the client, or we can present a structure and a design that we thought of, specifying of course the costs involved in its realization.

We like to create unique, interactive sites and applications, with suggestive and modern animations, that attract visitors' attention and create a strong positive impression in their eyes. We constantly consult with our clients for good synchronization and to ensure that the final product is as much to their liking as possible.

Having experience on frontend, backend, scripts, microservices, AI and creation of complex algorithms, we are flexible in the technologies we use, being able to adapt very easily to any technology and development environment. We are open to working in a team on larger projects and we are confident that we can handle any type of project in this industry.

FAQsection.title: Frequently Asked Questions
questionsAndAnswers: Question: How is the payment made?

Answer: The payment is made after the initial free session, the signing of the contract, and the receipt of the invoice, in advance for 6 sessions, by bank transfer (you can find the data in the contact section), by putting the student's name in the description.
Question: If I can't attend one day, what happens to the paid session?

Answer: For those who have chosen an individual study program, it is possible to move it to another day within the next 4 weeks. Those who are taught in a group system will unfortunately lose the paid session if the reason for the absence is not strictly objective.
Question: How can I benefit from the assistance offered outside of class hours?
Answer: You can ask us questions about the studied language by email or by chat on any social network. You are entitled to ask up to 4 questions at a time and the answer will come within 24 hours.
